metadata.Title: CVE-2022-35583 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: wkhtmlTOpdf 0.12.6 is vulnerable to SSRF which allows an attacker to getinitial access into the target's system by injecting iframe tag withinitial asset IP address on it's source. This allows the attacker totakeover the whole infrastructure by accessing their internal assets.

criterions.comment: wkhtmltopdf package in esm-apps/jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-07-18').
